channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: UK Supreme Court Says Trans Women Are Not Legally Women Under Equality Act
item.description: Britain’s Supreme Court ruled that the word “woman” referred to biological sex under the country’s anti-discrimination law, in a blow to trans rights ...

item.title: Trump’s tariffs dash hopes of VC comeback in 2025: ‘It’s going to be an ugly problem’
item.description: Tariff uncertainty is putting even more pressure on the VC market, leaving investors hesitant as tech companies postpone IPOs.

item.title: Deportation Fight Escalates, and America’s New Meth Crisis
Tariffs are coming for America’s favorite beer—but Modelo maker says it’s Trump’s immigration crackdown that’s hurting sales
item.description: Constellation Brands warns that while new tariffs will raise costs, it is President Trump’s immigration crackdown that is already driving down sales.

item.title: Faces From a Meth Surge
item.description: The devastating stimulant has been hitting Portland, Maine hard, even competing with fentanyl as the street drug of choice. Although a fentanyl overdo...

item.title: Judges’ Dilemma
item.description: Trump administration lawyers are saying some astonishing things in court, creating a conundrum for the judiciary.

item.title: Italy’s Meloni Heads to Washington to Meet Trump. Will It Pay Off for Europe?
item.description: The stakes are high as Giorgia Meloni, a conservative who shares some of Mr. Trump’s nationalist ideology, meets with him on Thursday as his trade war...

item.title: Exclusive: Senators Elizabeth Warren and Andy Kim demand investigation into DOGE cuts at CFPB
item.description: Warren, who had conceived of and oversaw the creation of the financial watchdog agency after the financial crisis, is now trying to defend it.

item.title: Global stocks decline as U.S. imposes ban on Nvidia exports to China
item.description: The U.S. bond market could come under further pressure, according to a research note published by JPMorgan.

item.title: Why an AI energy crisis may not unfold how you think
item.description: Fears that data centers would devour our power grid were rampant in the early 2000s. The solution wasn’t more power plants.

item.title: British Court Rules Legal Definition of Women is Based on Biological Sex
item.description: Britain’s Supreme Court ruled on Wednesday that trans women do not meet the legal definition of female under the country’s Equality Act.
